## MarkedListProps.rtlMarkerReversed property

Should the marker string be rendered in reverse order?

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rtlMarkerReversed?: true | false | RtlOptions;
```

## Remarks

Fine-grained options are available when you provide an option object. See `@jsamr/counter-style` documentation.
